website_summaries.verdict: A durable plyo box that adjusts to suit your needs and holds up well under a lot of weight and use.
pros: Heavy-duty steel construction that can hold a lot of weight
cons: It is very heavy, so it may not be the best option if you need something portable

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up - poor materials - poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The locking bar is made of very soft metal, you can get hurt if you aren't really careful locking the unit's height. What's worse is the manufacturer is difficult to deal with and makes the customer jump through hoops to get a simple replacement part. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Skibum

customer_reviews.title: Professional Level Quality. Outstanding Piece of Equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best quality products I have ever purchased. PERIOD. It is superbly made, extremely safe, easy to adjust and looks fantastic. It is as solid as anything in my local gym. It weighs a good 35-40 pounds. Plyo jumps at the 24" setting are as solid as jumping on top a granite block. It is that sturdy.Yesterday I was doing step-ups with a 135 pound barbell across my shoulders (I weigh 175) at the 16" setting. The Stamina X didn't groan, moan, sway, shake or otherwise compilation. This is one serious piece of gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Salami

customer_reviews.title: INSANELY heavy and strong
customer_reviews.text: This thing is about twice the size I thought it would be, and it is INSANELY heavy and sturdily constructed -- to the point of being overengineered. I'm pretty sure it could take the weight of a car. It's so heavy that it's a bit cumbersome to adjust the height, and it's heavy to move. But it's a sturdy platform as a result. The rubber surface on the top is thick and appears durable. Cons: I agree with another reviewer that the bar used as a locking mechanism is extremely flimsy, and likely to bend or break if you're not careful. This seems like a major oversight when the rest of the unit is so heavy-duty.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Tanks should be built this well!
customer_reviews.text: No..comparison...whatsoever! Bought on sale, but I must say... this thing is built like nothing I have bought 'new' in a very, very long time. The ONLY criticism I have is the height sticker falls off fairly easily. If the steel it was on was stamped in so that they sticker was recessed it would be an improvement. Its so nice I use as a seat, a stool, a step-ladder, a TV tray. It is steel and although the paint is nice, it will wear on the slot/ridge. So keep in a dry area or I would inspect/clean/lightly oil occasionally. Overall awesome!
customer_reviews.author: James Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great only wish it could go flat
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of this. Way better than having a bunch of boxes taking up space. Nice and sturdy. I haven't tried it on 24 inches yet, and I'm a little nervous since it did seem a little wobbly when I shook it by hand, but that might just be because I was shaking it and not stepping onto it. I'm going to try it. I would also like it fold flat. I feel like it could if they made it wider, which they probably don't want to do. Still, I think storing flat would be a big bonus.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Best Plyobox
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Well built and very sturdy. Very versatile for a home gym. Nice wide top. Not only great as a jump box, but you can also do dumb bell step ups, incline and decline push ups. Also works great for setting your dumb bells on between sets. I did all the research and watched video comparisons on different plyo boxes. This is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Adler

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: The Stamina requires a bit of a learning curve as it relates to physically moving the unit and engaging the various height markers. Additionally, the weight proves heavy enough to cause serious injury if the proper precautions are not enacted. Personally, I am unimpressed with the platform instability upon engaging the twenty-four inch height. However, the twelve and twenty inch settings work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: The HoF

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sturdy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy as heck and beautiful. The color (red) is gorgeous. The platform is textured, natural, rubber latex which provides some shock absorbency. It will be interesting to see how the pad wears on. I'm a heavy girl, 200lbs, and this platform does not waiver. Excellent investment for our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Klem

customer_reviews.title: I'ts almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly stable box regardless of the height I set it to. The only reason it's not perfect is the difficulty in adjusting the height from 12" to anything higher. It's just difficult to maneuver in that setting. It's HEAVY! I take it from client to client in my truck and it's a haul but easier than a big clunky box.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, ready for box jumps right away!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with vendor and item. Received the Stamina X Plyo Box the first day of the timeframe stated for delivery. Packaging and item arrived in excellent condition. The plyo box itself is easy to adjust, very sturdy, appears well-made. I used it in a workout with box jumps right away, and it doesn't budge, slip or sway. (Granted, I am a lightweight person, so I don't know how it would hold up under use by a heavier athlete, although from other reviews I read before I purchased it, it looks like it performs fine for larger folks.) I look forward to a lot of workouts with this!
customer_reviews.author: E. Tacata

customer_reviews.title: Don't read this... just BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a certified personal trainer and I bought this because I needed plyoboxes for my small home gym. An adjustable plyobox is a brilliant idea for saving space. This product is well built and works well. So pleased! Excellent price for the great quality. And it comes ASSEMBLED! Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: PennStateAlum

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this ploy box. It is high quality, very durable and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: kasmir

customer_reviews.title: Works but wobbles
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy. I am pretty heavy but I feel comfortable jumping off and off of it. However, the 4 legs aren't 100% even so it wobbles a bit. With that being said, for the price..I would have expected it to not wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Trang

customer_reviews.title: Space saver for garage workouts!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I use this for every workout for step ups, push ups, bend over rows... etc. Super easy to use. Great for an at home gym as its compact.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: its is heavy duty and seems to work well the the setting it came in. I have tried, everyone has tried to lift the top for another higher setting and it will not fit work work. cannot not lock it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Lochin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. Perfect for box jumps and any other plyo exercise. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: TailorMade

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Very stable, easy to adjust, and the platform is made of quality materials. Just be aware it's a bit heavy, but that's one of the factors making it so stable. I highly recommend this box.
customer_reviews.author: K. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank...
customer_reviews.text: ...I almost want to say they should've made it more square. It doesn't take up too much space and I respect the weight as it does it's job without fail! Step ups! Jump ups! Do what you have to do to get fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: strong, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: strong, but very heavy and does not fold completely flat, I would like to build similar platform out of Aluminum that fold completely flat.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Alan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product that is really sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Really cool product that is really sturdy and well made. It's even a great T.V tray or step stool whatever you want to use it for. So much better than having 4 separate stands. You can even take this with you if you travel a lot as I do. I can easily throw it in my van for road trips or when I go travel between homes. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian RN

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH IN EVERY WAY!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it!! I think it’s better than a regular wooden box because of the anti-slip features. I weigh 230 lbs. and it’s totally sturdy for me. I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Nlikeflynn

customer_reviews.title: Difficult at times to adjust..
customer_reviews.text: Great addwti my gym.. Probably be buying one more.. So many uses! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy (which it should be for the price.) This thing should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best workout equipment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of equipment, from the moment I received it, I have been using it. Best part about it is that it's adjustable. It's also sturdy and fits perfectly in the corner of my room when not in use. There are tons of exercises I can do with it a very versatile piece of equipment. Other reviews say it heavy but I'm 5 ft and not big at all and I can move it up and down the stairs, it's like a mini workout. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: juanaeliz

customer_reviews.title: This plyobox is absolutely the best. I need different levels but do not have ...
customer_reviews.text: This plyobox is absolutely the best. I need different levels but do not have room in my home for multiple one piece units. This unit does not clang or bang when used, it is completely silent. I also use it on carpet and it feels completely stable. VERY worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Javajane

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually quite nice. Its very solid, has nice sturdy lock-up and is stable. It's fairly easy to adjust and goes high enough that most people who are not high-lumping monsters will find acceptable. I'd say it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product you wont be disappointed. Equipment is well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my jump box
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super sturdy and l look forward to my at home/non running training days. Only thing is that it is quite heavy which makes it kind of a chore to readjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy! I'm addicted to stepping. :)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Getting ready for a Grand Canyon trip....addicted to this thing!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. I love the fact that it can compact to fit in a small space so I don't have multiple plyo boxes taking up a bunch of room!
customer_reviews.author: S711

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! It's easy to adjust and perfect for a home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrieg

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with stability; not with this item. I am over 200 lbs and I truly put it through the test...no issues. can withstand a good workout for years.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product, don't sacrifice for a cheap copy. This is made well, easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: SHall

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid! I'm a 6'3" 220 lb guy and this thing holds up with zero wobble. Love that it's such a space saver for my home gym too
customer_reviews.author: Alex Torres

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a box but is easier to move around and folds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Field

customer_reviews.title: Built to last and a great tool to complement your strength training at home
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and stable product that is a perfect addition to a home gym. I have my kids ages 10-12 using it as a part of their off season and in-season strength training for baseball
customer_reviews.author: John Scudder

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I purchased the pylo box from Stamina
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get jump boxes for my kids who play volleyball and basketball. I am glad I purchased the pylo box from Stamina. It is well constructed, sturdy, and heavy enough so that tipping over is not an issue. The box arrived quickly and the unit was very well packed with no damage whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: DW808

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Exactly what we needed for higher jumping for Volleyball
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mulhern

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that works for the work-out
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. It's a heavy, quality, steel adjustable plyo box. Exactly as advertised. The adjustment is easy. Nothing to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Plyo-tastic.
customer_reviews.text: Very stable even for a 250 guy like I. Wish I could flatten it all the way down, but it's worth the function and stability to not be able to drop it to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: eric austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and I found this safer than the competition product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ElenaTroya

customer_reviews.title: Great plyo box for CrossFit
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between this and a plywood plyo box for CrossFit. I am so glad I purchased this, it is compact, easy to store, and crazy stable. You won't be disappointed purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C.

customer_reviews.title: I wish i could adjust it to be higher but ya a great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdier than I thought it would be and has some weight to it. I wish i could adjust it to be higher but ya a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy as hell and a great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Plyo Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ploy box and it is also good looking and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Dorie

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid! Adjusts easily and doesn't move with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use product! No assembly= BONUS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 13 yo son to use for his speed/agility work outs. Easy to adjust; no assembly; solidly built product. Worth every penny! Will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: AMBP

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality item
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality item. Nice looking. Easy to use and sturdy. It's like a shiny piece of furniture. It can be used for dips, plyo jumps and more.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Simon

customer_reviews.title: Well designed! Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my Stamina box for some time now in my home gym and it's awesome because it doesn't take up a lot of space, the adjustable heights are convenient for different exercises that I do and it's a very sturdy product. Well designed!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gomez III

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast to adjust height
customer_reviews.text: Solid (NO wobble). Easy and fast to adjust height. Very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerInAustin

customer_reviews.title: Solid, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made - solid metal construction, very durable. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Compact and VERY sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very simple design that is perfect for a home gym. Compact and VERY sturdy. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Josef E

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to adjust by turning on it’s side. The 24” max height might not be high enough for taller athletes. It works splendidly for me at 5’8”.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL VALENZA

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality and Thoughtfully Designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece of equipment that I use every day with my training clients. The adjustability saves space and time, and the stability make it suitable for controlled movements or plyometric movements.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product with varying heights. Sturdy and ready for anything you put it through.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and stable product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stable product. No fear of it tilting or moving when you jump onto it. Easily adjusts to different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Massey

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: this think is built like a tank, very easy to change heights,, better than a box
customer_reviews.author: TROY B LICATA

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this plyo box - great for my tiny 600 SF apartment - I use it 3 x/wk doing sets of 15-20 for total of 100 at 12" height - working up ... I've already noticed improvement in my running strength and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: I am going to just say this - if you have some type of home workout routine, this Plyo Box will only enhance your routine. I read the reviews prior to my purchase and thought I didn't have anything to lose. Full disclosure, initially there were challenges with adjusting the Plyo but once you get that down, you are set. It is really sturdy and I get lots of body weight exercises done without any fear of the apparatus slipping. It is also great for core work, again because the Plyo is sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Plyo Box
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stable and easy to adjust. So convenient to use. No more time wasted trying to use multiple plyo boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a higher quality piece of exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.author: david LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: High quality and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my step from Stamina products! It is very high quality and very sturdy. My whole family has used it, weights ranging from 85-200 pounds and it has felt sturdy to each of us. The best thing about this, in my opinion, is the fact that it is adjustable. It doesn't take up a lot of space but you can use it at 4 different heights- I couldn't imagine trying to fit 4 different wooden plyo boxes in my garage! Some reviewers have said they had difficulty adjusting it but after doing it once, it is very easy. I am really happy I added this step to my garage gym!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: sturdy product with an ingenious design for changing heights
customer_reviews.text: The price may be a little steep, but you get a quality, sturdy product with an ingenious design for changing heights.
customer_reviews.author: soultranedaddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best sturdy... like anything I ever see 10 stars
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Plyo Box, easy to adjust height, and heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Crazyleggs

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable box allows step ups with weight at the lower setting and plyometric movements at the higher settings. It couldn't be built any sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Very sturdy. Does its job, it's an exercise step bench.It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition To Any Exercise Routine
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy box. A little pricey but great value for the money. It's like getting 4 boxes in one!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Plyo Box
customer_reviews.text: This plyo box is very sturdy it's adjustable and of high quality. It's a space saver with it's adjustable height perfect for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to change out height settings too
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely all that the reviews have cracked it up to be!! It holds all weight in our household from 120 - 260 without any concerns! It is easy to change out height settings too. While it is a bit heavy--it was expected and I am super impressed with the make and stability!! We are using it for plyometrics with the kids (teenagers) to build muscle and increase their vertical leap, as well as for stepping and aerobics/cardio!! Great product--I Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at a fitness equipment retailer about a year ago for much more. If your iffy about the quality, don't be. It is well made. It's a pretty solid piece of equipment and it's easy to adjust. BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. High quality, lots of options. It will get you FIT.
customer_reviews.author: Aranha

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and safe.. If you hurt yourself it's not because it's stable like most. It was wider than I expected which was great for jumping on a platform and the rubber surface keeps you put. A great piece of equipment that doesn't take up much room. Just a little heavier than I expected but you have to weigh in the stability factor. I am glad I bought this item.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Demott

customer_reviews.title: Jump On This Platform!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to adjust the height. I use this for so many exercises!
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: OMG this thing exceeded my expectations. This thing is rock solid and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jumping for joy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my young athletes of all sizes since it can adjust to all capabilities. It can be mildly challenging to change the heights of the platform which must be turned on it's side. The product is extremely solid and made well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Milanese

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and heavy duty. My wood box is large and cant use in the house this rocks!

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to be pretty easy to adjust the height
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid as a rock. I have so far only used the lowest setting, but it seems to be pretty easy to adjust the height.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product I get a lot of use from it ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid product I get a lot of use from it.

customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that it is worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I take it to clients house it's lite weight! I can't believe people buy 4 different boxes, when you can get all 4 in one!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank. Use it as a dumbbell stand when not using for workouts.

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made and heavy - stable landings. I haven't tried to adjust the height - using it at the 12" setting as it came out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for being at-home while utilizing very little space. Would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very stable! I feel safe to step and jump on it. Great product and it is worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow great product, built like a tank. leaves the wooden Plyo boxes in the dust. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, very stable
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, solid, sturdy, very stable. No assembly required. Ready to use right out of the box. Very easy and quick to adjust. I like the variable height adjustments. I use this mostly for stepping up/down while holding weights, no worries about knocking it over. Plenty of platform area for stepping. Great addition to my fitness room.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrick

customer_reviews.title: Supports a lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: Great for box jumps, step ups, one leg squats, etc. I had previously been using my bench for all of these things but this provides a sturdier base, without padding, and makes all of the plyo-metric exercises much safer. I am 6'4" and 240 and this easily supports my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tmoney

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it's a good one.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, sturdy -- we keep it out all the time for those moments when you want to jump around a bit. I'm a weakling and I don't find it too cumbersome to change the height, although it takes a smidge of muscle to navigate the box to the ground it's really not a big deal. Really like the adjustable height. Friends have commented on how sturdy it is too. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: littlegreendino

customer_reviews.title: Save space and money with this adjustable plyo box
customer_reviews.text: Stable and adjustable well worth the saving compared to buying multiple wooden boxes that are clumsy and take up too much space
customer_reviews.author: eric fader

customer_reviews.title: amazing amazing tool for the true athlete inside us all ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing amazing tool for the true athlete inside us all great construction and idea , love it
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and so far I am very pleased. When it arrived, I was pleased at how easy it was to "assemble" (I put that in quotes because it was an 8-minute job at best, which hardly qualifies as assembly). I tried it out first, and was very impressed at how sturdy it was. I'm about 175 lbs and when I jumped there was no give, no sliding, nothing ... solid as a rock. I took a chance on this brand because I wasn't familiar with it; but I figured for the price it was worth a try. We are very, very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a couple reasons- adjustable so it takes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a couple reasons- adjustable so it takes up very little space and I there is no assembly required!
customer_reviews.author: blippt

customer_reviews.title: Great Plyo Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great adjustable plyo box, the following are pros: - Great space saver - Sturdy - Good height variations
customer_reviews.author: Somnath Das

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustment piece
customer_reviews.text: This is one durable plyo box even on the higher settings I didn't move around at all with it and it saves space and when your doing a home gym that's definitely a big plus so it may be expensive but it's totally worth cause it feels like it's gonna hold up for quite a long time
customer_reviews.author: bradley jencks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy and I like how it provides different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Everything they say it is
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Heavy and stable. This is made to be handed down to your grandchildren. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki L.

customer_reviews.title: the product is perfect. well made
customer_reviews.text: the product is perfect. well made, sturdy. i like it a lot. it had a strong rubber smell when i unboxed it though. luckily it dissipated.
